ArabicText: حَدَّثَنَا أَبُو نُعَيْمٍ قَالَ حَدَّثَنَا سُفْيَانُ عَنْ مَنْصُورٍ عَنْ إبْرَاهِيمَ عَنْ عَلْقَمَةَ عَنْ عَبْدِ اللَّهِ
EnglishText: Narrated 'Abdullah: The Prophet (ﷺ) said, "Truthfulness leads to righteousness, and righteousness leads to Paradise. And a man keeps on telling the truth until he becomes a truthful person."

ArabicText: حَدَّثَنَا قُتَيْبَةُ بْنُ سَعِيدٍ حَدَّثَنَا أَبُو عَوَانَةَ عَنْ أَبِي حَصِينٍ عَنْ أَبِي صَالِحٍ عَنْ أَبِي هُرَيْرَةَ
EnglishText: Narrated Abu Huraira: The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said, "A Muslim has six rights over another Muslim: when you meet him, greet him; when he invites you, respond; when he seeks your advice, advise him; when he sneezes and praises Allah, say Yarhamuk Allah; when he is sick, visit him; and when he dies, follow his funeral."
